languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less (minimum 1). The first reload in a combat does not cost AP.
languages.original_text: Стоимость {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезарядки{/g} снижается на 2 ОД (не может опуститься ниже 1). Первая перезарядка в бою не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Reloading costs -2 AP less (minimum 1). The first reload in a combat does not cost AP.

Стоимость перезарядки снижается на 2 ОД (не может опуститься ниже 1). Первая перезарядка в бою не требует затрат ОД.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低2点（最低消耗1点）。战斗中的首次装弹不消耗行动点数。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less (minimum 1). The first reload in a combat does not cost AP.

traits.locale_text: 装弹消耗的行动点数降低2点（最低消耗1点）。战斗中的首次{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}装弹{/g}不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Recargar{/g} cuesta −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos (hasta un mínimo de 1). La primera recarga del combate no cuesta PA.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less (minimum 1). The first reload in a combat does not cost AP.

traits.locale_text: Recargar cuesta −2 PA menos (hasta un mínimo de 1). La primera {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} del combate no cuesta {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: Nachladen kostet −2 AP weniger (minimal 1). Das erste {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Nachladen{/g} in einem Kampf kostet keine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less (minimum 1). The first reload in a combat does not cost AP.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}rechargement{/g} coûte 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins (minimum 1). Le premier rechargement effectué au cours d'un combat ne coûte aucun PA.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less (minimum 1). The first reload in a combat does not cost AP.

traits.locale_text: Le rechargement coûte -2 PA de moins (minimum 1). Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}rechargement{/g} effectué au cours d'un combat ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが−2される（最低1）。戦闘内での初回リロードはAPを消費しない。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less (minimum 1). The first reload in a combat does not cost AP.

traits.locale_text: リロードのAPコストが-2される（最低1）。戦闘内での初回{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費しない。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Doldurma{/g} bedeli 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} azalır (minimum 1). Bir çatışmadaki ilk doldurma, EP harcamaz.
